description: '''Robin Andrew Guthrie''' (born 4 January 1962) is a Scottish musician, songwriter, composer, [[record producer]] and [[Audio engineering|audio engineer]], best known as the co-founder of the [[post punk]] [[alternative rock]] band [[Cocteau Twins]]. During his career Guthrie has performed guitar, bass guitar, [[keyboard instrument|keyboard]]s, drums and other musical instruments, in addition to [[Programming (music)|programming]], [[Sampling (music)|sampling]] and [[sound processing]].
